controllers
Class Admin

java.lang.Object
  play.mvc.Controller
      controllers.Mapper
          controllers.Admin
All Implemented Interfaces:
play.classloading.enhancers.ControllersEnhancer.ControllerSupport, play.classloading.enhancers.LocalvariablesNamesEnhancer.LocalVariablesSupport
public class Admin
extends Mapper

This defines the admin interface, which is a place to deal with things that are unmapped, &c. It works in conjunction with /admin/mapfeeds.html and /crud/

Author:
mattwigway

Nested Class Summary
private static class Admin.MetroAreaWithGeom
          This is just a proxy to serialize the important parts of a metro to JSON.

splitToAreas

public static void splitToAreas(NtdAgency agency)
For an agency that overlaps multiple metro areas, this makes the agency a member of each of them with no merging. This should be used, for example, when there are multiple distinct metro areas that have a single agency that serves all of them (for instance, NJ Transit in NYC).

saveSplitMetro

public static void saveSplitMetro()
Actually perform the split for a given metro

public static void splitMetroInteractively(long metroId,
                                           int splits)
Split a metro area into the given number of parts interactively.

Parameters:
metroId - The metro area to split
splits - The number of pieces to split it into

storedId -
